text: Chiron is a centaur from Greek mythology. He helped many demigods in their training. He is a respected centaur because of his kindness and intelligence. He is a son of Cronus. He lives in Mount Olympus. Chiron also taught Heracles before Heracles went to get the fruit in the Underworld. ==Other websites== *Theoi Project - Kentauros Kheiron Category:Greek legendary creatures
title: Chiron (mythology)
